TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi beforefieldinit Context extends System.Object

summary.span: 为驻留在其中的对象定义环境，在此环境中可以实施策略。

span.span: Defines an environment for the objects that are resident inside it and for which a policy can be enforced.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上下文是定义一个环境，用于为驻留在对象的属性有序的序列。A context is an ordered sequence of properties that define an environment for the objects resident inside it. 获取被配置为要求某些自动服务，如同步、 事务、 在实时激活、 安全性和等等的对象的激活过程中创建上下文。Contexts get created during the activation process for objects that are configured to require certain automatic services, such as synchronization, transactions, just-in-time activation, security, and so on. 多个对象可以存留在一个上下文内。Multiple objects can live inside a context. 类的实例用来标记类，该类提供了使用规则。Classes are marked with an instance of the class, which provides the usage rules. 每当实例化一个新的对象时，.NET Framework 找到一个兼容或创建的新实例对象类。Whenever a new object is instantiated, the .NET Framework finds a compatible or creates a new instance of the class for the object. 后一个对象放置到上下文中，将一直留在其生命周期。Once an object is placed in a context, it stays in it for life. 可以绑定到上下文的类称为上下文绑定类。Classes that can be bound to a context are called context-bound classes. 从另一个上下文访问时，会通过使用代理直接引用此类类。When accessed from another context, such classes are referenced directly by using a proxy. 从一个上下文中的对象对另一个上下文中的对象的任何调用将经过上下文代理，并受组合的上下文属性强制执行策略。Any call from an object in one context to an object in another context will go through a context proxy and be affected by the policy that the combined context properties enforce. 新对象的上下文通常基于类的元数据属性进行选择。A new object's context is generally chosen based on meta-data attributes on the class. 此机制是可通过自定义属性扩展。This mechanism is extensible through custom attributes. 这些被称为静态上下文属性，将编译到类元数据。These are known as static-context properties, which are compiled into the class meta-data. 动态上下文属性 （也称为配置属性） 可以应用，并可以由管理员配置。Dynamic-context properties (also known as configuration properties) can be applied and configured by administrators. 有关上下文的详细信息，请参阅[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7574180d-70df-44b8-8b78-55a119f2c96d)。For more information on contexts, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7574180d-70df-44b8-8b78-55a119f2c96d).

Allocates a named data slot.
A local data slot object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该数据槽分配所有上下文中。The slot is allocated on all the contexts. 命名的数据槽是公共的可以通过任何人进行操作。Named data slots are public and can be manipulated by anyone.

span.span: Gets the default context for the current application domain.

value.span: 命名空间的默认上下文。

span.span: The default context for the namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为其上下文未显式设置的应用程序域中每个线程将被视为默认上下文中运行。Every thread in an application domain for which a context is not explicitly set is considered to be running in the default context.

span.span: The delegate used to request the callback.

summary.span: 执行另一上下文中的代码。

span.span: Executes code in another context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过调用完成回调方法对其通过传入委托。A callback can be done by calling the method on it by passing in a delegate. 该委托用于请求回调。The delegate is used to request a callback. 必须是委托类类型。The delegate must be a class type.

summary.span: 清理非默认上下文的后备对象。

span.span: Cleans up the backing objects for the nondefault contexts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于默认上下文的后备对象清理在关闭期间向下的类。For default contexts, backing objects are cleaned up during shut down of the class.

summary.span: 冻结上下文，使其无法从当前上下文添加或移除上下文属性。

span.span: Freezes the context, making it impossible to add or remove context properties from the current context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上下文已被冻结后，不能添加上下文属性。Context properties cannot be added after the context has been frozen.

span.span: The context is already frozen.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool RegisterDynamicProperty (System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.IDynamicProperty prop, ContextBoundObject obj, System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context ctx);

.method public static hidebysig bool RegisterDynamicProperty(class System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.IDynamicProperty prop, class System.ContextBoundObject obj, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context ctx) cil managed
Public Shared Function RegisterDynamicProperty (prop As IDynamicProperty, obj As ContextBoundObject, ctx As Context) As Boolean

static member RegisterDynamicProperty : System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.IDynamicProperty * ContextBoundObject * System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context -> bool

span.span: The dynamic property to register.

param.name: obj
param.span: 为其注册 property 的对象/代理。

span.span: The object/proxy for which the property is registered.

param.name: ctx
param.span: 为其注册 property 的上下文。

span.span: The context for which the property is registered.

summary.span: 用远程处理服务注册实现 接口的动态属性。

span.span: Registers a dynamic property implementing the interface with the remoting service.

returns.span: 如果该属性已成功注册，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the property was successfully registered; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基于`obj`并`ctx`，`prop`要求参与接收器放在路径中的远程处理调用的某个位置。Based on `obj` and `ctx`, `prop` is asked to contribute a sink that is placed at some location in the path of remoting calls. 如果注册了多个属性，将可以调用之间进行切换以任意顺序调用它们的接收器。If multiple properties are registered, their sinks will be called in an arbitrary order that can change between calls. 如果`obj`不是`null`，然后如果它是一个代理，代理服务器上执行的所有调用都会被都截获和。If `obj` is not `null`, and then if it is a proxy, all calls made on the proxy are intercepted. 否则为如果`obj`是真实的对象，该对象上的所有调用都会被都截获。Otherwise, if `obj` is a real object, all calls on the object are intercepted. `ctx`参数必须是`null`。The `ctx` parameter must be `null`. 如果`ctx`不是`null`，`obj`必须是`null`和进入和离开上下文的所有调用都会被都截获。If `ctx` is not `null`, `obj` must be `null` and all calls entering and leaving the context are intercepted. 如果这两个`ctx`并`obj`是`null`，进入和离开所有上下文的所有调用都会被都截获。If both `ctx` and `obj` are `null`, all calls entering and leaving all contexts are intercepted.

exception.span: 要么 或其名称为 ，要么它不是动态的（不实现 ）。

span.span: Either or its name is , or it is not dynamic (it does not implement ).

exception.span: 对象和上下文都已指定（ 和 都不为 ）。

span.span: Both an object as well as a context are specified (both and are not ).
